tasks.build: deno task clean && deno run -A ../felt/cli.ts build .
tasks.production: deno task clean && PRODUCTION=1 deno run -A ../felt/cli.ts build .
tasks.dev: deno task clean && API_URL=https://toolshed.saga-castor.ts.net deno run -A ../felt/cli.ts dev .
tasks.dev-local: deno task clean && API_URL=http://localhost:${TOOLSHED_PORT:-8000} deno run -A ../felt/cli.ts dev .
tasks.dev-clusterduck: deno task clean && API_URL='http://localhost:7001' deno run -A ../felt/cli.ts dev .
